body.bibl: Caseau, Béatrice, and Charis Messis. “Stylites in the Middle Byzantine Period: The Case of the Novelistic Life of Theodore of Edessa.” In Syrian Stylites: Rereadings and Recastings of Late Ancient Superheroes, edited by Barbara Crostini and Christian Høgel, 161–80.
